text: Scunthorpe United F.C. is a football club which plays in England. == Name == *1899-1958 Scunthorpe & Lindsey United F.C. *1958-present Scunthorpe United F.C. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Third Division 10th 2001/02 Third Division 8th 2002/03 Third Division 5th 2003/04 Third Division 22nd 2004/05 League Two 2nd 2005/06 League One 12th 2006/07 League One Champions 2007/08 League Championship 23rd 2008/09 League One 6th === Former position === Category:English football clubs Category:1899 establishments in England
title: Scunthorpe United F.C.
